short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides your photos and names while browsing LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect Your Professional Privacy with One Click

LinkedIn Privacy Shield is the essential Chrome extension for professionals who want to browse LinkedIn anonymously in shared environments like libraries, coffee shops, and co-working spaces.

🌟 Key Features:

🔒 Instant profile anonymization
👤 Blocks personal photos
🏷️ Conceals names on all LinkedIn pages
🚫 Prevents over-the-shoulder privacy breaches
💻 Lightweight and quick to activate

Our extension ensures you can browse freely without revealing your identity.

🌟 How It Works:

One-click anonymity
Blocks personal identifiers
Works across all LinkedIn pages
Easy toggle on/off
Privacy Matters

🌟 No data collection

We don't track you
No personal information stored

🌟 Compatibility

Works with all LinkedIn pages
Supports latest Chrome versions
Minimal system resources
Zero performance impact

Download now and take control of your professional browsing privacy!

The author of the extension is not affiliated with LinkedIn
